answers.answer: Dear Nancy,This may be related to circulation although it would be difficult to tell.  Please consult with your local physicain if these symptoms continue to be troublesome.

question: I have pain on the bottom of my feet in the heel, but just on the bottom.  It feel almost hot.  This hurts especially at night. I am a 34 year old women, 15 lbs overweight, who recently started working out again. I have also recently cut caffeine out of my diet(I drank alot of Coke.)  Is this circulation related? Is there anything I can do about it, it's been going on about a week.  You're advice is greatly appreciated. (I am not on medication except tylenol with codeine for ovary pain once in awhile. There is a family history of high blood pressure, diabetes and cholestorol problems, but I've never had any of the above)
title: Pain in my heels, what could it be?
